heading: Double Swing Barbarian and Fireball Sorcerer Endgame Build Guides are Live!
content: We've published 2 new Diablo 4 Endgame Build Guides and have several more on the way. dropped this week and after a little more testing the Guides are live, Take a sneak peek at each of them below before diving into the guides! is the new king of Crowd Control. This build leaves enemies in a worthless state while you slice them to death. You'll Lure Elites in with , the moment this stun ends you keep them locked down with . Who's the one with the infinite CC now?! This build is quite easy to gear up and dominates from early endgame all the way to Tier 100 Nightmare Dungeons. While unfortunately still being locked into the 3 Shout META, it still feels like a Barbarian as you constantly assault your enemies and punish them greatly with your endless . Currently one of the strongest Barbarian Builds available, it's a must try for fans of the class. uses the aforementioned to explode everything in sight. The AoE damage of this build is excellent, but it struggles against tanky enemies like Bosses in high-tier . In all other types of content this build destroys everything and makes a great show out of it. Sorcerer runs the usual repertoire of Defensive Skills, which keep you very safe and tanky until you delve deep into Nightmare Dungeons. There, enemies deal a lot more damage, so you have to kill or Crowd Control enemies before they can kill you. More new build guides are coming as we settle into Season 1. If you haven't already, head over to our and select the D4 role in to stay up to date with our content development. Sanctuary here we come! Written by:
